meanings.definition: Not metallic; lacking the properties of a metal.
meanings.sent1: The nonmetallic substance was not shiny like metal.
meanings.sent2: The plastic was nonmetallic and did not conduct electricity.
meanings.sent3: The nonmetallic rock thought it was a gem, but it was just plain.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a nonmetallic quality, soft and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The nonmetallic paint gave the room a warm and cozy feel.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a nonmetal.
meanings.sent1: The nonmetallic elements were not found on the periodic table.
meanings.sent2: The nonmetallic compounds were used in the experiment for their unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The nonmetallic cloud floated lazily across the sky, unlike its metallic counterparts.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmetallic personality shone brightly in a world of steel and iron.
meanings.sent5: The nonmetallic taste of the fruit was refreshing and crisp.
